name: Survivalgo
description: A simple play test of a game to teach algorithms to children. This version made in Ludum Dare 46. You can play it from commands at the top of the screen. I am planning to use this in real life at my classroom so ludum dare was a good excuse to start this project. I hope you can gain enough insight through this mini version. Also this is my second game in this ludum dare, you can find my compo game at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/precious-animals
